Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: goose bumps \goose bumps\ n. Same as {gooseflesh}. [PJC]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
gooseflesh \gooseflesh\ n. A peculiar roughness of the skin produced by cold or fear, in which the hair follicles become erect and form bumps on the skin; -- called also {goose skin}, {goose pimples}, {goose bumps}.
Syn: goose bumps, goose pimples, goose skin. [WordNet 1.5]
